item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔签署出售波斯尼亚钢厂和铁矿的协议
item.description: 世界第二大钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔公司在一份声明中说，该公司周五签署了一项协议，将其在波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那的钢厂和铁矿出售给总部设在波斯尼亚的 Pavgord 集团。【原文：ArcelorMittal, the world's second-largest steelmaker, signed a deal on Friday to sell its steel mill and iron ore mine in Bosnia and Herzegovina to the Bosnia-based Pavgord Group, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，阿波罗将为英国欣克利角核电项目提供 60 亿美元资金
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，美国私募股权集团阿波罗全球将提供 45 亿英镑（60.8 亿美元）的债务融资，以支持英国欣克利角核电项目。【原文：U.S. private equity group Apollo Global will provide 4.5 billion pounds ($6.08 billion) in debt financing to support Britain's Hinkley Point nuclear project, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯首席执行官获得为期 5 年的新合同
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯首席执行官米格尔-洛佩兹（Miguel Lopez）已获得一份为期五年的新合同，这家德国企业集团周五表示，还确定了夏季召开特别股东大会的日期，以便让股东批准其防务部门的上市计划。【原文：Thyssenkrupp CEO Miguel Lopez has received a new five-year contract, the German conglomerate said on Friday, also setting a summer date for an extraordinary general meeting to let shareholders approve the planned listing of its defence unit.】

item.title: 独家报道：竞购截止日期临近，土耳其航空探索收购欧洲航空股份
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，土耳其航空公司正在探讨竞购欧罗巴航空公司（Air Europa）的少数股份，这是对这家西班牙航空公司表示兴趣的最新一家航空公司。【原文：Turkish Airlines is exploring making a bid for a minority stake in Air Europa, the latest carrier to express interest in the Spanish airline, according to two sources with knowledge of the deal, with binding bids due in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称卡塔尔就以色列与伊朗冲突风险与能源公司举行会谈
item.description: 一位业内人士和该地区的一位外交官告诉路透社，在以色列袭击了伊朗与卡塔尔共享的巨大天然气田之后，卡塔尔本周与能源巨头举行了危机会谈。【原文：Qatar held crisis talks this week with energy majors after Israeli strikes on Iran's huge gas field, which it shares with Qatar, an industry source and a diplomat in the region told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔：鉴于通胀数据，美联储应在七月前考虑降息 - CNBC
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯-沃勒（Chris Waller）周五表示，鉴于近期通胀数据温和，且进口关税对价格的冲击将是短暂的，美联储应考虑在下次会议上降息。【原文：The Federal Reserve should consider cutting interest rates at its next meeting given recent tame inflation data and the fact that any price shock from import tariffs will be short lived, Fed governor Chris Waller said on Friday.】

item.title: 博雅银行将 STOXX 600 指数年度目标上调至 530 点
item.description: 博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）周五将STOXX 600指数的年终目标从500点上调至530点，原因是中美贸易休战后全球经济增长具有韧性。【原文：BofA Global Research on Friday raised its year-end target for the STOXX 600 index to 530 from 500 on resilience in global growth following a U.S.-China trade truce.】

item.title: 保险公司 Aflac 披露网络安全事件
item.description: 保险公司 Aflac 周五表示，它于 6 月 12 日在其美国网络上发现了可疑活动。【原文：Insurer Aflac said on Friday it identified suspicious activity on its network in the United States on June 12.】

item.title: 达顿餐饮公司上调销售预期，季度业绩超出预期，原因是休闲餐饮需求旺盛
item.description: 达顿餐饮集团（Darden Restaurants）周五公布了强劲的季度业绩，预计全年同店销售额将高于预期，这主要得益于食品外卖的需求以及橄榄园（Olive Garden）等休闲餐饮连锁店的广告宣传。【原文：Darden Restaurants forecast annual same-store sales above estimates after strong quarterly results on Friday, banking on demand driven by food delivery and advertising efforts at its casual dining chains such as Olive Garden.】

item.title: 克罗格上调年度销售目标，因杂货需求强劲
item.description: 克罗格（Kroger）周五上调了年度同店销售预期，押注强劲的食品杂货需求将抵消美国消费者因关税导致的经济不确定性而减少的自由支配支出。【原文：Kroger bumped up its annual same-store sales forecast on Friday, betting on strong grocery demand to offset reduced discretionary spending as American consumers grapple with tariff-driven economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗冲突导致美国股票基金资金大幅流出
item.description: 截至6月18日的一周，美国股票基金创下三个月来最大单周流出量，原因是以色列与伊朗之间的紧张局势加剧，以及对美国提高关税对经济影响的持续担忧促使投资者减少风险敞口。【原文：U.S. equity funds logged the largest weekly outflow in three months in the week through June 18 as intensifying Israel-Iran tensions and persistent concerns over the economic impact of elevated U.S. tariffs drove investors to reduce risk exposure.】

item.title: 早间竞标为期两周的中东窗口期令人欣慰
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 埃森哲第三季度收入超出预期
item.description: 周五，埃森哲第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是这家咨询巨头的企业客户对其人工智能驱动服务的需求不断增长。【原文：Accenture beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Friday, driven by growing demand for the consulting giant's AI-driven services from enterprise customers.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势引发全球股票基金三个月来最大流出量
item.description: 截至 6 月 18 日的一周，全球股票基金净流出 198.2 亿美元，为三个月来最大，原因是中东紧张局势升级和美国贸易政策的不确定性挥之不去，抑制了投资者情绪。【原文：Global equity funds recorded net outflows of $19.82 billion for the week ended June 18, the largest in three months, as escalating Middle East tensions and lingering uncertainty over U.S. trade policies dampened investor sentiment】

item.title: 明镜》报道：奥迪可能在美国建厂以安抚特朗普
item.description: 据《明镜》（Spiegel）新闻杂志周五报道，在关税冲突中，为了安抚唐纳德-特朗普总统，大众汽车旗下高端品牌奥迪可能考虑在美国的一个新地点建厂。【原文：Volkswagen's premium brand Audi could build a plant at a new location in the United States under scenarios being considered to placate President Donald Trump in the tariff conflict, the Spiegel news magazine reported on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 投资者评估地缘政治和经济数据，股市稍作喘息
item.description: 投资者将关注以色列-伊朗冲突和下周公布的美国经济数据，以评估股市的近期前景，因为 S&P 500 指数徘徊在略低于 2 月份高点的位置。【原文：Investors will focus on the Israel-Iran conflict and U.S. economic data releases next week to assess the near-term outlook for stocks, as the S&P 500 hovers just below its February highs.】

item.title: 中东战争进入第二周，华尔街期货走低
item.description: 华尔街股指期货周五走低，原因是投资者评估了有关美国军事介入中东冲突的评论，以及美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）对未来通胀上升发出的警告。【原文：Wall Street stock index futures edged lower on Friday as investors assessed comments on U.S. military involvement in the Middle East conflict, and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's warning on rising inflation ahead.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，吉普车制造商斯泰兰特正在权衡玛莎拉蒂的出售方案
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，Stellantis 正在考虑出售陷入困境的豪华品牌玛莎拉蒂，以及其他一些选择。【原文：Stellantis is considering a possible sale of its struggling luxury Maserati unit, among other options, two sources with knowledge of the matter said, as the automaker seeks to overhaul its sprawling portfolio of 14 brands.】

item.title: 吉利将持有雷诺控股的巴西合资公司 26.4% 的股份
item.description: 中国吉利周五表示，吉利及其母公司吉利控股（GEELY.UL）将合计持有其法国合作伙伴雷诺控制的一家合资企业26.4%的股份，双方寻求在巴西联合生产和销售汽车。【原文：China's Geely said on Friday it and its parent Geely Holding (GEELY.UL) would take a combined 26.4% stake in a joint venture controlled by its French partner Renault as the two seek to produce and sell cars jointly in Brazil.】

item.title: 解说员：特斯拉将如何远程控制其机器人轴？
item.description: 特斯拉预计最快将于周日在德克萨斯州奥斯汀市推出期待已久的机器人出租车服务，届时将有大约 10 辆 Y 型 SUV 在严格限制的范围内运行。首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，公司对安全问题 "超级偏执"，人类将对车队进行远程监控。【原文：Tesla is expected to tiptoe into its long-awaited robotaxi service in Austin, Texas, as soon as Sunday with about 10 of its Model Y SUVs that will operate within strict limits. CEO Elon Musk has said the company is being "super paranoid" about safety and that humans will remotely monitor the fleet.】

item.title: Cognizant 将投资 1.83 亿美元建设印度新园区，新增 8000 个工作岗位
item.description: 印度维沙卡帕塔纳姆邦政府周五宣布，软件服务公司 Cognizant Technology Solutions 将投资 158.2 亿卢比（1.8276 亿美元）在印度南部城市维沙卡帕塔纳姆建设一个新园区，该园区将创造约 8000 个工作岗位。【原文：Software services firm Cognizant Technology Solutions will invest 15.82 billion rupees ($182.76 million) to build a new campus in south Indian city of Vishakapatanam that will create about 8,000 jobs, the state government announced on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普的经济 "黄金时代 "遭遇美联储的铜墙铁壁
item.description: 在美联储官员看来，特朗普 "美国的黄金时代从现在开始 "的承诺仍未兑现，他们认为特朗普的政策会导致经济放缓，失业率和通胀率上升，关税争论仍未解决，也会给经济前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Trump's promise that "the golden age of America begins right now" remains unfulfilled in the outlook of Federal Reserve officials who so far see his policies slowing the economy, raising unemployment and inflation, and clouding the horizon with a still-unresolved tariff debate.】

item.title: 独家报道英伟达与富士康洽谈在休斯顿人工智能服务器制造厂部署仿人机器人
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，台湾富士康和美国人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）正在洽谈在富士康位于休斯敦的新工厂部署仿人机器人，该工厂将生产英伟达人工智能服务器。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn and U.S. artificial intelligence chips maker Nvidia are in talks to deploy humanoid robots at a new Foxconn factory in Houston that will produce Nvidia AI servers, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 挪威计划临时禁止电力密集型加密货币挖矿
item.description: 北欧国家挪威政府周五表示，挪威将暂时禁止建立使用最耗电技术挖掘加密货币的新数据中心，以便为其他行业节约用电。【原文：Norway aims to impose a temporary ban on the establishment of new data centres that mine cryptocurrency with the most power-intensive technology, in order to conserve electricity for other industries, the Nordic country's government said on Friday.】

item.title: 土耳其竞争管理机构对谷歌 PMAX 发起调查
item.description: 土耳其反垄断机构周五表示，将对谷歌的 Performance Max（PMAX）展开调查，以确定这款人工智能广告活动产品是否违反了竞争法。【原文：Turkey's antitrust authority will launch a probe into Google's Performance Max (PMAX) to determine if the AI-powered ad campaign product violates competition laws, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 英国食品杂货监管机构就亚马逊涉嫌拖延供应商付款一事展开调查
item.description: 英国食品杂货监管机构周五对亚马逊展开调查，调查这家零售巨头是否在三年内违反了及时向供应商付款的规定。【原文：Britain's grocery regulator on Friday launched an investigation into Amazon , probing whether the retail giant breached rules on timely supplier payments over a three-year period.】

item.title: 礼来公司称印度对肥胖症药物 Mounjaro 的反应 "积极"，将致力于满足需求
item.description: 礼来公司表示，其大片药物 Mounjaro 在印度的反响 "积极"，并补充说该公司正致力于满足世界上人口最多的国家对该药物的需求。【原文：Eli Lilly said the response for its blockbuster drug Mounjaro has been "positive" in India, adding that it is focusing on meeting demand for the drug in the world's most populous country.】

item.title: 据一财网报道，特斯拉与上海签署价值 5.57 亿美元的储能站协议
item.description: 据当地媒体 Yicai 周五报道，特斯拉在中国的首个电网规模电池存储站将位于上海，使用的是特斯拉的巨型电池组。【原文：Tesla's first China grid-scale battery storage station using its megapack batteries will be located in Shanghai, local media Yicai reported on Friday.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧，世界石油市场受到关注
item.description: 布伦特原油 6 月迄今已上涨约 20%，并将创下 2020 年以来的最大单月涨幅，原因是以色列和伊朗的紧张局势加剧。【原文：Brent crude oil is up around 20% so far in June, and set for its biggest monthly jump since 2020 as Israel/Iran tensions flare-up.】

item.title: 韩国称 SK 和亚马逊将在该国最大的数据中心投资 50 亿美元
item.description: 韩国科学部周五表示，韩国 SK 集团将投资约 7 万亿韩元（约合 51.1 亿美元），其中包括亚马逊云服务提供商亚马逊网络服务（Amazon Web Services）提供的 40 亿美元，用于在南部城市蔚山建设一个数据中心。【原文：South Korea's SK Group will invest around 7 trillion won ($5.11 billion) including $4 billion from Amazon Web Services, Amazon's cloud services provider, to build a data centre in the southern city of Ulsan, the Science Ministry said on Friday.】
